mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity(name, content, closingDate, visitTotal, stadiumId, createDate, startDate, endDate, sort, updateDate, contentHtml, showHome, status, applyTotal) VALUES(#{name}, #{content}, #{closingDate}, 0, #{stadiumId}, NOW(), #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{sort}, NOW(), #{contentHtml}, #{showHome}, #{status}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET status='0' WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.content, a.closingDate, a.visitTotal, a.stadiumId, a.createDate, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.sort, a.updateDate, a.status, a.contentHtml, a.applyTotal, s.name as stadiumName FROM activity a LEFT JOIN stadium s ON a.stadiumId=s.id

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.content, a.closingDate, a.visitTotal, a.stadiumId, a.createDate, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.sort, a.updateDate, a.status, a.contentHtml, a.applyTotal, s.name as stadiumName FROM activity a LEFT JOIN stadium s ON a.stadiumId=s.id LEFT JOIN member_activity ma ON a.id=ma.activityId LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id=ma.memberId WHERE m.id=#{memberId} AND a.endDate < now()

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM activity a LEFT JOIN stadium s ON a.stadiumId=s.id LEFT JOIN member_activity ma ON a.id=ma.activityId LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id=ma.memberId WHERE m.id=#{memberId} AND a.endDate <now()

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.content, a.closingDate, a.visitTotal, a.stadiumId, a.createDate, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.sort, a.updateDate, a.status, a.contentHtml, a.applyTotal, s.name as stadiumName FROM activity a LEFT JOIN stadium s ON a.stadiumId=s.id WHERE a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET visitTotal=visitTotal+1 WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE activity SET applyTotal=applyTotal+1 WHERE id=#{activityId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM member_activity WHERE memberId=#{memberId} AND activityId=#{activityId}

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.content, a.closingDate, a.visitTotal, a.stadiumId, a.createDate, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.sort, a.updateDate, a.status, a.contentHtml, a.applyTotal, s.name as stadiumName FROM activity a LEFT JOIN stadium s ON a.stadiumId=s.id WHERE a.endDate > now() AND a.status='1' AND a.stadiumId=#{stadiumId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM activity a where a.endDate > now() AND a.status='1' AND a.stadiumId=#{stadiumId}

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.content, a.closingDate, a.visitTotal, a.stadiumId, a.createDate, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.sort, a.updateDate, a.status, a.contentHtml, a.applyTotal, s.name as stadiumName FROM activity a LEFT JOIN stadium s ON a.stadiumId=s.id WHERE a.endDate < now() AND a.status='1' AND a.stadiumId=#{stadiumId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM activity a where a.endDate < now() AND a.status='1' AND a.stadiumId=#{stadiumId}
